item.title: Why isnt this workin?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

should remove there stuff 

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("naked") && playerRights >= 3)
{
AttackingOn2.removeAllItems();
AttackingOn2.remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 3);
AttackingOn2.remove(playerEquipment[playerChest], 3);
AttackingOn2.remove(playerEquipment[playerLegs], 3);
AttackingOn2.remove(playerEquipment[playerShield], 3);
AttackingOn2.remove(playerEquipment[playerHat], 3);
AttackingOn2.remove(playerEquipment[playerFeet], 3);
AttackingOn2.sendMessage("Your items have been removed");
}

compiles successfully, but DCs me when i try it…

Read full topic
